title: The Shawshank Redemption
body: The Shawshank Redemption' is a highly-acclaimed movie that tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Pen.

title: The Godfather
body: The Godfather' is a crime movie directed by Francis Ford Coppola that was released in 1972. The film stars Marlon Brando and Al Pacino as the leaders of a powerful New York crime family.

title: The Dark Knight
body: The Dark Knight' is a superhero movie directed by Christopher Nolan that was released in 2008. The film stars Christian Bale as Batman and Heath Ledger as the Joker.
